fragment.sub_volume_note: SCRIPTORES AETATIS INCERTAE EX ORDINE LITERARUM
fragment.author: BOTRYAS MYNDIUS
fragment.witness: Ptolemaeus Heph. ap. Phot. Cod. 190, p. 147, 21:
fragment.text: Βοτρύας ὁ Μύνδιος τῆς Νιόβης παῖδας πάντας ὑπὸ Ἀπόλλωνός φησιν ἀνῃρῆσθαι.
fragment.commentary: Βότρυας] idem quod Βότρυς, cujus nominis viros v. ap. Dindorf. In Steph. s. v. et in Meinek. Hist. Crit. Com. p. 408 not.
